Interface NetworkConfig.NetworkConfigAddPeerHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    NetworkConfig

    public static interface NetworkConfig.NetworkConfigAddPeerHandler
    Interface defining handler for adding peers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void addPeer(NetworkConfig networkConfig, HFClient client, Channel channel, String peerName, String peerURL, Properties peerProperties, Channel.PeerOptions peerOptions, javax.json.JsonObject jsonPeer) 

    • Method Detail

      • addPeer

        void addPeer(NetworkConfig networkConfig,
             HFClient client,
             Channel channel,
             String peerName,
             String peerURL,
             Properties peerProperties,
             Channel.PeerOptions peerOptions,
             javax.json.JsonObject jsonPeer)
      throws NetworkConfigurationException
        Parameters:
        networkConfig - The network configuration.
        client - The client to be used to create the peer.
        channel - The channel the peer is to be added.
        peerName - The peer's name.
        peerURL - The peers's url
        peerProperties - properties that were found in the networkconfig
        peerOptions - options when adding peer to the channel.
        jsonPeer - json peer was created
        Throws:
        NetworkConfigurationException
